setting.location: Aboard the anchored Hispaniola, island cove

characters.action: Sawing through thick rope with knife

scene.mainElements: Boy secretly cutting ship adrift while pirate guards sleep, moonlight creating dramatic shadows on deck
scene.details: Thick anchor rope fraying under knife blade, hemp fibers parting strand by strand, empty rum bottles rolling with ship's gentle motion, coiled ropes and ship equipment casting shadows, island shoreline visible in distance, small boat tied alongside
scene.background: Moonlit cove, dark jungle on shore, stars reflected in calm water
scene.atmosphere: Tense stealth mission, one boy against pirates, desperate courage in darkness

composition.cameraAngle: Close low angle on rope and hands
composition.focus: Knife cutting through anchor rope, fraying strands
composition.depth: Rope and hands in sharp foreground, sleeping pirates middle ground, moonlit water and island background
